resources.string: ■ Display [Battery] screen \n ･On general Android devices, it is displayed in [Settings] [Battery]. \n･Depending on the device, it may not be called by this app because it is not originally built in or it has its own screen.

■ Display [Battery optimization] screen \n･Can be called from the [Apps & notifications] [Special app access] screen on general Android devices. \n･Depending on the device, it may not be called by this app because it is not originally built in or it has its own screen.
